TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to run 'Summary Print Report'.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click filter option.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click filter option.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click filter option.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to check option 'Valid Records'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to check option 'Valid Records'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to check option 'Valid Records'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select 'From Date'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select 'From Date'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select 'From Date'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select 'To Date'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select 'To Date'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select 'To Date'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'Apply' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'Apply' button'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'Apply' button.
